description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr:
sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{
  application="notification-service",
  status="200",
  uri="/v1/time-deposits",
  cluster="$cluster",
  method="POST",
  namespace="$namespace"
}[$__range]))
sum by(uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="notification-service", status=~"2.*", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", uri!~"/actuator/.*"}[$__range]))
sum by(uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="notification-service", status=~"2.*", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", uri!~"/actuator/.*"}[$__range]))

irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application=~".*notification-service.*", uri!~".*actuator.*", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application=~".*notification-service.*", uri!~".*actuator.*", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])

sum by(uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application=~".*notification-service.*", status=~"5.*", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", uri !~ "/actuator/.*",  uri !~ ".*/docs/.*"}[$__range]))

title: Time Deposit Service
